criteria.name: Completeness
criteria.description: All required sections and elements are present. The submission addresses all parts of the assignment.

criteria.name: Accuracy
criteria.description: Information provided is correct, well-researched, and factually sound. Sources are cited where appropriate.

criteria.name: Clarity and Organization
criteria.description: Writing is clear, well-organized, and easy to understand. Ideas flow logically and are well-structured.

criteria.name: Quality and Presentation
criteria.description: Overall quality of work shows attention to detail, professionalism, and effort. Formatting is consistent.
